feed.title: Heavy Hitters
feed.subtitle: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

entry.title: Super Bowl 58 Preview and Predictions - Season 3 Episode 19

link.title: Super Bowl 58 Preview and Predictions - Season 3 Episode 19

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a preview of Super Bowl 58 in Las Vegas, Nevada at Allegiant Stadium by breaking down both teams and their path to the Super Bowl along with their stats and how they compare head-to-head with each other. At the end of the episode, Dean gives us his predictions for the big game on Sunday along with a hint of what’s to come next week.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: AFC and NFC Conference Championship Game Recap, NHL Returns to the Olympics, and Corbin Burnes Traded to the Orioles a Day After Rubenstein Buys the Team - Season 3 Episode 18

link.title: AFC and NFC Conference Championship Game Recap, NHL Returns to the Olympics, and Corbin Burnes Traded to the Orioles a Day After Rubenstein Buys the Team - Season 3 Episode 18

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean talks about the AFC and NFC conference championship games as he breaks down the result and his takeaways from both games that happened last Sunday. After that, he gives us his reaction to the NHL returning to the Olympics and also with the Baltimore Orioles making a blockbuster trade for star pitcher Corbin Burnes a day after the O’s announced big news regarding new ownership of the team.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: NFL Divisional Round Predictions and Reaction to Cowboys Retaining Mike McCarthy - Season 3 Episode 17

link.title: NFL Divisional Round Predictions and Reaction to Cowboys Retaining Mike McCarthy - Season 3 Episode 17

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a recap of what happened in the wildcard round of the NFL playoffs from last weekend, along with his predictions for the upcoming games this weekend in the divisional round. After that, he gives us his reaction to the Cowboys, retaining their head coach Mike McCarthy.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

After that, he gives us his reaction to the Cowboys, retaining their head coach Mike McCarthy.

entry.title: CFB National Championship Game Recap, Football Coaching Carousel, and NFL Wild Card Weekend Picks - Season 3 Episode 16

link.title: CFB National Championship Game Recap, Football Coaching Carousel, and NFL Wild Card Weekend Picks - Season 3 Episode 16

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean, and special guest Lucas Jafet, give us a recap along with their reaction to what happened in the international championship game on Monday night, with Michigan coming away with the win over Washington, and they also give us their takeaways. After that, they both give us an update on what’s going on in the NFL and in college football with Alabama regarding some coaching changes. To close out the show, Dean and Lucas give us their most surprising animals, most underwhelming teams of the regular season along with their picks for this week’s games in wildcard weekend along with some notable teams that could be a dark horse to make a deep run in the NFL playoffs.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

link.title: CFB National Championship Game Predictions and NFL Week 18 Picks - Season 3 Episode 15

entry.content:

entry.title: TNF Recap, NFL Week 17 Picks and Russell Wilson Benched in Denver Reaction - Season 3 Episode 14

link.title: TNF Recap, NFL Week 17 Picks and Russell Wilson Benched in Denver Reaction - Season 3 Episode 14

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives you a recap of the Thursday night football game that took place in Cleveland, Ohio between the Cleveland Browns and the New York Jets along with his picks for the rest of the games this weekend in week 17 of the 2023-24 NFL season. Dean also gives us his reaction to the news of Russell Wilson being benched for the final two games of the season, potentially leading to a new era in Denver without Wilson as their QB for next season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: NFL Week 16 Picks, Yamamoto to the Dodgers Reaction, and UFC 296 Recap - Season 3 Episode 13

link.title: NFL Week 16 Picks, Yamamoto to the Dodgers Reaction, and UFC 296 Recap - Season 3 Episode 13

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives you his picks for the games this week in the NFL in week 16. Along with that, Dean gives us his reaction to Yamamoto signing a 12 year deal with the LA Dodgers. Finally, Dean ends the episode with recapping the main event and co-main event of UFC 296 from this past Saturday.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

entry.title: NFL Week 15 Picks, Ohtani to the Dodgers Reaction, Interesting Islanders, UFC 296 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 12

link.title: NFL Week 15 Picks, Ohtani to the Dodgers Reaction, Interesting Islanders, UFC 296 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 12

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his NFL week 15 picks along with his reaction to the news regarding Shohei Ohtani joining the Dodgers on a massive 10 year deal. After that, Dean gives us his thoughts on the “interesting” New York Islanders regarding how they’ve been performing as of late. To close out the episode, Dean gives us his picks for the co-main event and main event for UFC 296.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: CFB Playoff Reaction, Predictions, and NY6 Bowl Game Review (ft. Keenan Womack) - Season 3 Episode 11

link.title: CFB Playoff Reaction, Predictions, and NY6 Bowl Game Review (ft. Keenan Womack) - Season 3 Episode 11

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean, along with special guest Keenan Womack, give us their reactions to the CFB playoff ranking that came out on Sunday, along with their predictions, X-factors, Heisman picks, and a review of all the NY6 bowl games.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Conference Championship Week Discussion, Frank Reich Fired, NFL Week 13 Picks, Cardinals Going All Out for Pitching, Patrick Kane, NHL Biggest Surprise/Disappointment After November - Season 3 Episode 10

link.title: Conference Championship Week Discussion, Frank Reich Fired, NFL Week 13 Picks, Cardinals Going All Out for Pitching, Patrick Kane, NHL Biggest Surprise/Disappointment After November - Season 3 Episode 10

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a review of the top 25 rankings along with his conference championship week picks, a breakdown of the Heisman trophy race and playoff predictions after the games. Then he gives us his reaction to the Reich firing and his week 13 picks. After that Dean gives us his thoughts on the Cardinals address pitching in the offseason so far. Finally, he closes out the episode with his reaction to Patrick Kane being signed by Detroit along with the Wild making a coaching change and a breakdown of his biggest surprise and disappointment thus far in the season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
